titleStmt.title: SII 8.54: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 54. (A.R. No. 466 of 1902). ON THE SAME WALL.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī cakalapuvaṉaccakkaravattikaḷ Avaniyāḷappiṟantārāṉa śrīkopperuñciṅkadevarkku yāṇṭu muṉṟāvatu nāḷ Eṇpattoṉṟu coḻakoṉ
Ōlai . teṉṉavaṉ pirammārāyarum maturāntakaviḻupparaiyarum Uṭaiyār tirucciṟṟampalamuṭaiyār koyil śrīmāheśvara kaṇkāṇi ceyvārkaḷum
cikāriyañceyvārkaḷum cāmutāyañ ceyvārkaḷum koyilnāyakañ ceyvārkaḷum tirumāḷikaikkūṟu ceyvārkaḷum paṇṭārappottaka mu
ṭaiyārkaḷuṅ kaṇakkaruṅ kaṇṭu viṭutantatāvatu . koyilukkum tirukkāmakkoṭṭamuṭaiya periyanācciyār koyilukkum pālamutu ceytaruḷavum pāṟ
poṉakap pālukkum kulottuṅkacoḻaṉ tirukkocālai Aṇukkaṉ curavikaḷukku mutalāka Iṣapamum tiruccūlamuñ cāttit tirukkocālai yiṭaiyarkku muta
lāka muṉṟāvatu nāḷ Aṟupattāṟināl viṭṭa pacu nāṉūṟ ṟorupatiṉāl Uru Oṉṟukku celavirācakecariyāl Uḻakkāka nāḷoṉṟukku pāl kalaṉe Aṟunāḻiuriyum
viṭṭu Amutuceytaruḷavum muṉpu nivantakkaṭṭuppaṭi viṭṭu Amutu ceytaruḷi vanta pāllile Ippāl kalaṉe Aṟunāḻi Uriyum viṭukai tavirntu Ippālukku muṉ
pi lāṇṭukaḷum ney Oṭṭukoṇṭu varumpaṭiye ney mutalkoṇṭu tirumaṭaippaḷḷip paṇṭārattukku mutalāka Aḷakkavum Intap pacukkaḷukku pacu nūṟṟai
mpatukku per Oṉṟāka vanta per mutalkoḷḷavum Ipperkku koṟṟukku per Oṉṟukku nāḷ Oṉṟukku patakkāka vanta nellum puṭavaimutal Āṭṭaikkup perāl Oṉṟarai
yāka vanta kācukkup patiṉaiṅkalappiṭiyāl vanta nellum palapaṇi nivantakkāṟarkku jīvitam Aṭaikkumpaṭiye jivitam Aṭaikkavum periyatevarkku muṉṟāvatu kuṭu
tta pacu Eṇṇūṟ ṟeḻupatum nālāvatu kuṭutta pacu Irunūṟṟorupattāṟum Ākat tirumañcaṉattukku Āṭiyaruḷa veṇṇaiurukku neykkum pāluk kuṭalākavum tevakoṉ
pacu Āyiratteṇpattāṟiṉāl Uru Oṉṟukku celvirācakecariyāl Uḻakkāka Aḷantuvarukiṟa pāl Irukalaṉe Irutūṇik kuṟuṇi Eḻunāḻi Uriyum Ākap pacu Āyirattu
nāṉūṟṟut toṇṇūṟṟāṟum viṭṭapaṭikku kulottuṅkacoḻaṉ tirumāḷikaip puṟavāyilile kal veṭṭavuṅ kaṭavatākavum paṇṇuvate . Ivai coḻakoṉ Eḻutteṉ
ṟu vanta Evarṟtiṭṭiṉpaṭi kal veṭṭiyatu .
Digital edition of SII 8.54 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
